name: Discover XI (DXI) KT guide
title: Discover XI (DXI) KT guide
body:
Introduction

Welcome to the "minimal" Discover XI KT guide. This guide will get you familiar with the product basics, so that you can get started with supporting Tivian DXI.

Please note that this is still a work in progress, so more content is on its way to you!

First things first - accesses!

Go through the Discover XI (DXI) Agent Access Guide and make sure you request all accesses before moving forward.

Once you've requested them, you can proceed with the next steps.

Getting familiar & hands-on

DXI Basic Overview

For all intents and purposes of this training:

  • Project = Survey (legacy Tivian team and even customers may refer to a project as a "survey")
  • Globalpark = Questback = EFS = Tivian XI = DXI (the product has undergone multiple rebrandings overtime)

The DXI Glossary will help you go through the terms that you are not familiar with while learning the product, so it is best to keep this handy for easy reference.

Before going deeper, please review the below resources that should give you an overall idea of what DXI is, and overall architecture of the product, so you have a better starting point:

  • DXI Enterprise Feedback Suite Overview
  • EFS Architecture and Building Blocks - Technical Overview
  • Third Party Software/Technologies Used in EFS

As you may have inferred from the above articles/s, DXI is organized in modules, each serving a different purpose, so we will take them one by one. But first... ü•Å

Create your own user

In PasswordState, there is a shared user for this activity (shared_support). So go to Password state to snatch the credentials, and then proceed to creating your own user, as guided in Account, Team, Organization Management in EFS, with the following options:

  1. Username to match your DF AD
  2. Your Trilogy email
  3. Mark all teams
  4. Primary team: System Administrator
  5. Organization: TIVIAN
  6. Select your time zone

Once that is done, logout of the shared user, and then login with your fresh account to get tackle the training.

Make sure you bookmark that instance URL, as that will be our internal training and test instance.

Best learning path is hands-on, so we'll dive right into things.

Training Modules

Each module will have its own dedicated article, and you can access each individual training module using the below links.

  1. Projects Module Training
  2. People Module Training
  3. Portal Module and Website Module Training
  4. MySight Module and Reporting+ Training
  5. Platform Administration and Tivian Access Training
  6. DXI L2 Training (WIP)
